00010 // Check against redundant including

00014 // Include appropriate headers

00018 /********************************************************
00019         CLASS INTERFACE/IMPLEMENTATION
00020 
00021         The entire class is implemented inline for speed.
00022  ********************************************************/
00023 
00024 class tt_copy:public tt_audio_base{
00025 
00026         private:
00027                 
00028         public:
00029                 tt_copy(void)   // Constructor          
00030                 {
00031                         ;
00032                 }
00033 
00034                 ~tt_copy(void)          // Destructor
00035                 {
00036                         ;
00037                 }
00038                 
00039                 // DSP LOOP
00040                 void dsp_vector_calc(tt_audio_signal *in, tt_audio_signal *out)
00041                 {
00042                         int vs = in->vectorsize;
00043                         while(vs--)
00044                                 *out->vector++ = *in->vector++;
00045                         in->reset(); out->reset();
00046                 }
00047 
00048                 // DSP LOOP
00049                 void dsp_vector_calc(tt_audio_signal *in1, tt_audio_signal *in2, tt_audio_signal *out1, tt_audio_signal *out2)
00050                 {
00051                         temp_vs = in1->vectorsize;
00052                         while(temp_vs--){
00053                                 *out1->vector++ = *in1->vector++;
00054                                 *out2->vector++ = *in2->vector++;
00055                         }
00056                         in1->reset(); in2->reset(); out1->reset(); out2->reset();
00057                 }
00058 };
00059 
00060 #endif // TT_COPY_H
